title: Chickens pt 2: Practicalities of Home Production of Eggs
description: Imagine the joy of chickens running around your yard and gifting you with dozens of fresh eggs every month... NOT. The practical realities require thought and planning and an some understanding of chicken behavior --- which will likely differ from your romantic dreams. I think that it is worth it. Let me know what you think.
